@liumaumasi Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind was a wonderful game!

Many of our favorite games were not in the category of "visually stunning" :)

@Acephalosses It was more to start a conversation. We do not believe a game with good graphics is automatically good, and we also do not believe that games with bad graphics are automatically bad. 

Everything is a balance, but ultimately graphics are secondary to the gameplay.
@YokoFren Exactly. ğŸ˜‰
Does a game need good graphics to be a good game?
